elements.label: Secrecy
elements.description: The more quietly we go about our business, the more business we may go about. [You can use this card to increase your cult's Discretion. Or, you might use it to destroy and downgrade other Reputation cards.]

elements.label: Cult Discretion: Amateur
elements.description: We are small in number - perhaps that is for the best. [Your cult can only support six members without arousing untenable suspicion.]

elements.label: Cult Discretion: Modest
elements.description: We are more, now, but still we are careful. [Your cult can support twelve members without arousing untenable suspicion.]

elements.label: Cult Discretion: Considerable
elements.description: We throng in the shadows. [Your cult can support eighteen members without arousing untenable suspicion.]

elements.label: Cult Discretion: Invisible
elements.description: We are as an invisible hand, and our reach is longer with each passing sunset. [Your cult can support twenty four members without arousing untenable suspicion.]
